app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online, Scheme S1: Plant phenylpropanoid pathway PAL, phenylalanine ammonia lyase; C4H, cinnamate 4-hydroxylase; 4CL, 4-coumaroyl-CoA ligase; CCR, cinnamoyl-CoA reductase; HCT, hydroxycinnamoyl-CoA shikimate/quinate hydroxycinnamoyl transferase; C3H, p-coumaroylshikimate 3â€™-hydroxylase; CAD, cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase; CAAT, coniferyl alcohol acetyl transferase; COMT, caffeic acid O-methyltransferase; CCOMT, caffeoyl-CoA.O-methyltransferase; F5H, ferulate-5-hydroxylase; CVS, chavicol synthase; EGS, eugenol synthase., Table S1: Information about the main constituents of the basil essential oil in limit allowed., Table S2: ANOVA for the traits evaluated in the manuscript.
